title: I'm a Madewell Stan—Here's Every 5-Star Item on My Shopping List
excerpt: A fashion editor shares her favorite picks from Madewell.
text: Mall brands are having a major comeback and Madewell is leading the charge. As the sister brand of J.Crew, Madewell has built a strong reputation for creating simple yet stylish basics. It's a go-to retailer for great denim (the just-launched Dean Easy Straight Jeans ($148) have already won editors' hearts), chic bags and belts that constantly sell out, and both on-trend and classic footwear. Plus, the brand's cool collaborations—from chic suede trenches with Tumblr queen Alexa Chung to vibrantly printed pieces with Lisa Says Gah—always go viral. In short, Madewell is well worth your attention.Capsule wardrobe enthusiasts rejoice—I've curated a collection of the brand's best pieces below, including polished outerwear, easygoing knitwear, and office-ready looks that offer the perfect everyday uniform. Don’t just take my word for it. Keep scrolling to officially hop on the Madewell train. Madewell Single-Breasted Trench Coat This one is an obvious choice. Madewell The Dean Easy Straight Jean The brand's new style of denim is inspired by the early 2000s and features a relaxed straight-leg fit. Madewell Cashmere Button-Front Cardigan Sweater For channeling your inner office siren. Madewell Studded Western Belt The best part of this personality piece is that it's under $100. Madewell The Dimes Kitten-Heel Boot A black bootie is a wardrobe essential. Madewell Cocoon-Sleeve Denim Lady Jacket Dark-wash denim is on-trend this spring. Madewell Fair Isle Alpaca-Blend Sweater Fair Isle sweaters will always be cool. Madewell The Curvy Darted Barrel-Leg Jean in Dobbins Wash For the barrel-jean fans. Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote This tote is perfect for commuting to the office (or the beach). Madewell Northside Vintage Tee Everyone needs a staple t-shirt. Madewell Double-Faced Mini Skirt in Wool Blend I'm taking styling notes—the cherry red is such a fun pop of color. Madewell The Maycie Asymmetric T-Strap Sandal Madewell Denim High Crewneck Vest Denim on denim always looks put-together. Madewell The Extra-Large Essential Bucket Tote The suede material is so luxurious. Madewell Relaxed Dolman Button-Up Shirt I'll never say no to a classic button-up. Madewell The Sculptural-Buckle Shoulder Bag Little black bags are necessary. Baggy jeans are my weakness. Madewell The Remy Mary Jane Flat If you don't adore traditional ballet flats, try their cooler older sister, Mary Janes. Madewell Softwool Boxy Crewneck Sweater I need this sweater in every color. Madewell The Essential Leather Belt They call it the Essential Leather Belt for a reason. Madewell Pintucked Ruffled Puff-Sleeve Top Boho chic is calling—this flouncy top is the answer. Madewell Superwide-Leg Jeans The fit and wash on these are perfect. Madewell Drapey Rib Long-Sleeve Polo Top This knit is a more mature take on the current polo-top craze. Madewell The Dakota Saddle Bag This olive-green shade is everything. Madewell Pull-On Straight Pants in Stretch Satin Swap out your trousers for silk pants. The material adds an interesting twist to everyday looks. Madewell x Leset Pointelle Slim-Fit Tee The pointelle details are so cute. Madewell Flannel Button-Up Shirt-Jacket in Plaid Okay hear me out: Flannels will be back this year. Madewell Relaxed Bootcut Jeans These look like luxury jeans that cost over $400—thankfully, these will only run you about $150. Madewell The Nettie Heeled Mary Jane Madewell's heeled take on the preppy Mary Janes has become a best seller. Madewell The Harlow Wide-Leg Pant in Brushed Twill Run: These are currently on sale. Madewell The Essential Curve Shoulder Bag This curved shape is an elevated take on the classic crossbody silhouette.
html:
Mall brands are having a major comeback and Madewell is leading the charge. As the sister brand of J.Crew, Madewell has built a strong reputation for creating simple yet stylish basics. It's a go-to retailer for great denim (the just-launched Dean Easy Straight Jeans ($148) have already won editors' hearts), chic bags and belts that constantly sell out, and both on-trend and classic footwear. Plus, the brand's cool collaborations—from chic suede trenches with Tumblr queen Alexa Chung to vibrantly printed pieces with Lisa Says Gah—always go viral. In short, Madewell is well worth your attention.

Capsule wardrobe enthusiasts rejoice—I've curated a collection of the brand's best pieces below, including polished outerwear, easygoing knitwear, and office-ready looks that offer the perfect everyday uniform. Don’t just take my word for it. Keep scrolling to officially hop on the Madewell train.

Madewell

Single-Breasted Trench Coat

This one is an obvious choice.

Madewell

The Dean Easy Straight Jean

The brand's new style of denim is inspired by the early 2000s and features a relaxed straight-leg fit.

Madewell

Cashmere Button-Front Cardigan Sweater

For channeling your inner office siren.

Madewell

Studded Western Belt

The best part of this personality piece is that it's under $100.

Madewell

The Dimes Kitten-Heel Boot

A black bootie is a wardrobe essential.

Madewell

Cocoon-Sleeve Denim Lady Jacket

Dark-wash denim is on-trend this spring.

Madewell

Fair Isle Alpaca-Blend Sweater

Fair Isle sweaters will always be cool.

Madewell

The Curvy Darted Barrel-Leg Jean in Dobbins Wash

For the barrel-jean fans.

Madewell

Handwoven Leather Tote

This tote is perfect for commuting to the office (or the beach).

Madewell

Northside Vintage Tee

Everyone needs a staple t-shirt.

Madewell

Double-Faced Mini Skirt in Wool Blend

I'm taking styling notes—the cherry red is such a fun pop of color.

Madewell

The Maycie Asymmetric T-Strap Sandal

Madewell

Denim High Crewneck Vest

Denim on denim always looks put-together.

Madewell

The Extra-Large Essential Bucket Tote

The suede material is so luxurious.

Madewell

Relaxed Dolman Button-Up Shirt

I'll never say no to a classic button-up.

Madewell

The Sculptural-Buckle Shoulder Bag

Little black bags are necessary.

Baggy jeans are my weakness.

Madewell

The Remy Mary Jane Flat

If you don't adore traditional ballet flats, try their cooler older sister, Mary Janes.

Madewell

Softwool Boxy Crewneck Sweater

I need this sweater in every color.

Madewell

The Essential Leather Belt

They call it the Essential Leather Belt for a reason.

Madewell

Pintucked Ruffled Puff-Sleeve Top

Boho chic is calling—this flouncy top is the answer.

Madewell

Superwide-Leg Jeans

The fit and wash on these are perfect.

Madewell

Drapey Rib Long-Sleeve Polo Top

This knit is a more mature take on the current polo-top craze.

Madewell

The Dakota Saddle Bag

This olive-green shade is everything.

Madewell

Pull-On Straight Pants in Stretch Satin

Swap out your trousers for silk pants. The material adds an interesting twist to everyday looks.

Madewell x Leset

Pointelle Slim-Fit Tee

The pointelle details are so cute.

Madewell

Flannel Button-Up Shirt-Jacket in Plaid

Okay hear me out: Flannels will be back this year.

Madewell

Relaxed Bootcut Jeans

These look like luxury jeans that cost over $400—thankfully, these will only run you about $150.

Madewell

The Nettie Heeled Mary Jane

Madewell's heeled take on the preppy Mary Janes has become a best seller.

Madewell

The Harlow Wide-Leg Pant in Brushed Twill

Run: These are currently on sale.

Madewell

The Essential Curve Shoulder Bag

This curved shape is an elevated take on the classic crossbody silhouette.
